pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Regression with Meshed Gaussian Processes // Fits Bayesian spatial or spatiotemporal multivariate regression models based on latent Meshed Gaussian Processes (MGP) as described in Peruzzi, Banerjee, Finley (2020) doi:10.1080/01621459.2020.1833889 and Peruzzi, Banerjee, Dunson, and Finley (2021) arXiv:2101.03579. Funded by ERC grant 856506 and NIH grant R01ES028804.
